title: Website and Web App Development
copy: Craft responsive, scalable, and user-friendly websites and web applications using React, JavaScript, Svelte, and modern frameworks. Whether it's a dynamic web app, an e-commerce platform, or a custom business website, I deliver fast, modern, and engaging solutions tailored to your needs.
more:
What I Offer:

  • Responsive Design: Websites and apps optimized for all devices (mobile, tablet, desktop).
  • SEO-Ready Solutions: Built with on-page SEO best practices for better visibility on search engines.
  • Cross-Browser Compatibility: Ensuring seamless performance on all major browsers.
  • Performance Optimization: Fast load times with a focus on user experience.
  • API Integration: Integration with third-party tools and services like payment gateways, analytics, and more.
  • Scalable Architecture: Solutions designed to grow with your business.
  • Maintenance & Support: Ongoing updates, bug fixes, and improvements.

Why Choose Me?

I combine cutting-edge technologies with user-centric design principles to create products that are not only functional but also visually appealing. My goal is to exceed your expectations and deliver solutions that help your business thrive.

Tech Stack Expertise:

React, JavaScript (ES6+), Svelte, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Firebase, and more.

title: E-Commerce Development
copy: Build and launch feature-rich, scalable online stores using WordPress (WooCommerce), Shopify, and modern e-commerce tools. From secure payment gateways to efficient product management, I craft seamless and engaging shopping experiences designed to boost sales, customer retention, and business growth.
more:
What I Offer:

  • Custom Store Design: Unique and visually appealing designs tailored to your brand identity.
  • Payment Gateway Integration: Secure and reliable options, including PayPal, Stripe, and local gateways.
  • Mobile-First Approach: Fully responsive stores optimized for mobile shoppers.
  • Inventory Management: Simplified product management with intuitive back-end systems.
  • E-Commerce SEO: Optimized product pages and site structure to improve search engine rankings.
  • Multi-Language & Currency Support: Reach a global audience with multilingual and multi-currency features.
  • Third-Party Integration: Integration with tools like Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, CRM systems, and email marketing platforms.
  • Performance Optimization: Fast loading times for better user experience and higher conversion rates.
  • Ongoing Support & Maintenance: Regular updates, troubleshooting, and new feature rollouts.

Why Choose Me?

I combine technical expertise with a deep understanding of e-commerce trends to deliver stores that are beautiful,functional, and sales-driven. Whether you're a startup or an established brand, I can help you take your online businessto the next level.

Tech Stack Expertise:

WordPress (WooCommerce), Shopify, Elementor, Liquid, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and REST APIs.

title: Cross-Platform Mobile App Development
copy: I create responsive, scalable, and high-performance mobile applications using React Native and modern frameworks. My solutions deliver seamless user experiences across iOS and Android, ensuring that your app stands out in both functionality and design.
more:
What I Offer:

  • Custom App Design: Visually appealing and intuitive interfaces tailored to your brand identity.Offline Support: Apps that work flawlessly even without an internet connection, ensuring uninterrupted user experiences.
  • Auto-Update Features: Seamless updates for enhanced functionality without requiring reinstallation.
  • Cross-Platform Compatibility: A single codebase optimized for both iOS and Android devices, reducing development time and cost.
  • API Integration: Connect your app with third-party services like payment gateways, CRMs, and analytics tools.
  • Push Notifications: Boost engagement with timely and targeted notifications.
  • Performance Optimization: Apps built for speed, smooth animations, and minimal load times.
  • Security Features: Robust data protection with encryption, authentication, and secure storage.

Why Choose Me?

With a focus on user-centric design and cutting-edge technologies, I deliver apps that are fast, reliable, and engaging.Whether you're launching a new product or enhancing an existing one, I'll help you build mobile solutions that driveresults and delight users.

Tech Stack Expertise:

React Native, Expo Framework, JavaScript, TypeScript, SQLite, Firebase, REST APIs, and GraphQL.

title: Digital Marketing
copy: Accelerate your business growth with targeted and results-driven digital marketing campaigns on Google Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram), and other leading platforms. I specialize in creating and managing strategies that maximize ROI, boost conversions, and generate quality leads for your business.
more:
What I Offer:

  • Google Ads Campaigns: Precise keyword targeting, ad copy optimization, and A/B testing to increase click-through rates and conversions.
  • Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram): Engaging ad creatives and audience targeting strategies to enhance brand visibility and drive sales.
  • Social Media Advertising: Customized strategies for LinkedIn, TikTok, or Pinterest to expand your reach.
  • Performance Analytics: Track campaign performance with real-time insights and data-driven adjustments for maximum efficiency.
  • Landing Page Optimization: Ensure your ad traffic converts with high-performing and visually appealing landing pages.
  • Remarketing Campaigns: Re-engage past website visitors and retain existing customers to boost long-term growth.
  • Budget Management: Optimize ad spend for maximum value, regardless of your budget size.

Why Choose Me?

With a proven track record in digital advertising and a focus on results, I bring the expertise to help your business:

  • Increase ROI with carefully managed campaigns.
  • Generate High-Quality Leads that convert into customers.
  • Boost Brand Awareness and establish a strong online presence.
  • Save Time by outsourcing your digital marketing efforts to a dedicated expert.
Tools and Expertise:

Google Ads, Meta Ads Manager, Google Analytics, Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO), Keyword Research, AudienceTargeting, and Ad Creative Development.

title: SEO (Search Engine Optimization)
copy: Boost your website's visibility and drive organic traffic with comprehensive and proven SEO strategies. I help businesses rank higher on search engines, attract their target audience, and stay ahead of the competition through a combination of on-page, off-page, and technical SEO techniques.
more:
What I Offer:

  • Keyword Research & Strategy: Identify high-impact, relevant keywords tailored to your business niche to attract the right audience.
  • On-Page Optimization: Optimize website content, meta tags, headers, and images to improve search engine rankings and user experience.
  • Technical SEO: Ensure your site meets all technical requirements for search engines, including improved site speed, mobile-friendliness, schema markup, and crawlability.
  • Content Creation & Optimization: Craft engaging, SEO-friendly content that ranks well and resonates with your audience.
  • Link Building & Outreach: Build high-quality backlinks to improve domain authority and strengthen your site’s online reputation.
  • Local SEO: Dominate local searches with Google My Business optimization and location-based strategies.
  • SEO Audits & Reporting: Regularly analyze your website’s SEO performance and provide actionable insights with detailed reports.
  • Competitor Analysis: Monitor and stay ahead of competitors with in-depth analysis of their SEO strategies.

Why Choose Me?

  • Proven track record of improving search rankings for businesses across various industries.
  • Tailored SEO strategies that align with your business goals.
  • Stay updated with the latest SEO trends and algorithm changes to ensure long-term results.
  • Transparent progress tracking with regular reports and insights.
Results You Can Expect:
  • Higher rankings on Google and other search engines.
  • Increased organic traffic and qualified leads.
  • Enhanced brand visibility and credibility in your market.
  • A fast, optimized, and user-friendly website that converts visitors into customers.
Tools and Expertise:

Google Search Console, Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs, Screaming Frog, Yoast SEO, and more.

title: Maintenance & Support
copy: Keep your website or application running smoothly with reliable and proactive maintenance and support services. I ensure your digital assets are secure, updated, and optimized, so you can focus on scaling your business with peace of mind.
more:
What I Offer:

  • Security Monitoring & Updates: Protect your site or app with regular security patches, vulnerability scans, and malware removal.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously enhance load times, server response, and overall performance for a seamless user experience.
  • Bug Fixes & Troubleshooting: Quickly resolve technical issues, ensuring uninterrupted functionality for your users.
  • Content Updates: Keep your content fresh and relevant with regular updates to images, text, and other elements.
  • Backup & Recovery: Set up automated backups and disaster recovery plans to safeguard your data and minimize downtime.
  • Compatibility Updates: Ensure compatibility with the latest browsers, devices, operating systems, and software versions.
  • Analytics & Reporting: Monitor website or app performance with detailed insights and actionable recommendations.
  • Scalability Support: Prepare your platform for growth with upgrades and infrastructure improvements as needed.

Why Choose Me?

  • 24/7 Support: Dedicated support to address issues and keep your platform operational at all times.
  • Tailored Plans: Maintenance packages customized to meet the specific needs of your business.
  • Proactive Monitoring: Identify and resolve potential issues before they affect your site or app.
  • Experience You Can Trust: Expertise in handling a variety of platforms, including WordPress, Shopify, custom web apps,and mobile applications.
Tools and Expertise:

WordPress Maintenance Plugins, Google Analytics, uptime monitoring tools, performance optimization tools, and more.

Benefits You'll Gain:
  • A secure and reliable platform that builds customer trust.
  • Reduced downtime, ensuring uninterrupted operations.
  • Improved performance, delivering a faster and smoother user experience.
  • Peace of mind knowing your digital presence is in capable hands.
